article_title: Where The Big Healthcare Bulls Are Running

article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: The Annual JP Morgan conference is a great opportunity for entrepreneurs and venture investors to learn where the big players think U.S. healthcare is going, and how they plan to play. Here’s a summary of the trends I heard at the conference, and what they might mean for entrepreneurs.
og.title: Where The Big Healthcare Bulls Are Running: Notes From The 2015 JP Morgan Conference
